definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose

sentences.english: Carotenoids have three absorption peaks in the blue-violet region of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 类胡萝卜素在光谱的蓝紫部分有三个吸收峰。

sentences.english: It also contains carotenoids which is responsible for better vision.
sentences.chinese: 杏中还含有一些负责提高视力的类胡萝卜素。

sentences.english: The abstraction of carotene from Rhoddoseudo-monas Palustris strain B.
sentences.chinese: 类胡萝卜素的提取进行了研究。

sentences.english: Carotenoids in Potamogeton crispus L. is a natural source of the red pigment in the red yolk of duck eggs.
sentences.chinese: 菹草类胡萝卜素是红心鸭蛋中红色素的天然来源。

sentences.english: Carotenes that have not undergone transformation have greater anti-oxidation effects.
sentences.chinese: 未接受变革的胡萝卜素有更加了不起的抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: The stability of carotenoid pigment extracted from Rodopseudomonas palustris was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了沼泽红假单胞菌类胡萝卜素的稳定性。

sentences.english: The carotenoids from Ipomoea batatas were separated and determined by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 应用高效液相色谱法分离和测定红心薯中类胡萝卜素。

sentences.english: Apricots, fresh or dried, are high in beta-carotene.
sentences.chinese: 杏子，新鲜或干燥的，富含贝它胡萝卜素。

sentences.english: Another major class of nutritional characteristics of the natural pigment is carotenoid .
sentences.chinese: 另一大类具有营养特性的天然色素是类胡萝卜素。

sentences.english: Lycopene is a kind of carotenoids which has the activity of preventing cancer and anti-cancer.
sentences.chinese: 番茄红素是一种具有抗癌抑癌活性的类胡萝卜素。

sentences.english: The abstraction and analysis of compositions of carotene from Rhodopseudomonas Palustris strain B.
sentences.chinese: 类胡萝卜素的提取方法和组分进行了研究。

sentences.english: Liquidising or juicing also increases carotenoid availability from carrots.
sentences.chinese: 流体化或榨汁也增加了从胡萝卜类胡萝卜素的可用性。

sentences.english: Beta-carotene also works with lecithin to maintain the body's mucous membranes.
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜素也适用于粘膜与卵磷脂，以保持身体的。

sentences.english: Carotenes will be transformed into vitamin A according to the needs of the body.
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜素将被变换成维生素A根据身体的需要。

sentences.english: Pheasants have demonstrated the importance of carotenoids to them.
sentences.chinese: 山鸡显示了对类胡萝卜素给他们。

sentences.english: Research shows that of any food, apricots possess the highest levels and widest variety of carotenoids.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明在食物中，杏仁含有最丰富的类胡萝卜素。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4
